thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 31 of 948
thread.title: Manbeast77

author: Manbeast77
title: Manbeast77
text: So far I've had no real problems getting or redeeming any games I've gotten. My only issue is: there's no real way to get a refund if the game is unplayable. I don't mean the game is bad and you dislike it, I mean truly unplayable. Either it won't start because it's a bad console port, or it just doesn't like your version of windows kind of unplayable. Other than that, I tell people about Bundle Stars all the time.
